p: Most of presence records of S. alterniflora on Chinese coast were obtained from published studies (An et al., 2007; Xie & Gao, 2009; Zhang et al., 2010; Zhang et al., 2008; Zhao et al., 2015; Zheng et al., 2018). The others were obtained from field sampling, and the Global Biodiversity Information Facility (available at http://data.gbif.org/). The presence records were resampled in ArcGIS 10.2 to ensure that there is only one observation within the 1° by 1° cell to avoid spatial autocorrelation and reduce sampling bias (Merckx et al., 2011), resulting in retention of 106 presence records. For the northern Chinese coast and southern Chinese coast, there were 56 presence records and 48 presence records, respectively.
